A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: A big disappointment for a life-long Star Wars fan. Waited 30+ years to see a worthy sequel to the original Star Wars trilogy where Luke Skywalker finally gets to show off\, and instead we got this paint by numbers mess of a story. So much potential squandered. But hey\, I'm sure it will make a ton of money for Disney\, who actually cares about making a genuinely well constructed story.
